author: Kayla Epstein and Kimberly Leonard
title: Rare photos show lawmakers sitting in the House's public gallery and using social distancing while voting on $2 trillion coronavirus relief bill
description: The House passed a $2 trillion stimulus package on Friday afternoon after weeks of furious negotiation on Capitol Hill about how to address the economic fallout of the coronavirus. Congressmembers had to practice social distancing in the House chamber during …
content: Photos are usually not allowed in the House chamber, and designated press are only allowed to take photos during events like the State of the Union. But lawmakers broke that rule during Friday's historic vote on a massive coronavirus relief package, as lawmak… [+2329 chars]
